titles.title: Savior Lead Me Up The Mountain (easy nice)

properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Lead me higher up the mountain Give me fellowship with Thee In Thy light I see the fountain And the blood it cleanses me{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Savior lead me up the mountain Where the Lord alone is seen Where we hear the voice from heaven Where the air is pure and clean{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Higher up where light increases Far above all earthly strife Where the strain of effort ceases Where in Christ we reign in Life{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Savior keep me up the mountain Pressing on toward the goal Till as one we share Thine image And Thy love and grace extol{/lang-eng}
